resources.string: My name is Juan José Gallego Mesa, I am an electronic engineer from the University of Antioquia and a Telecommunications engineer from the Metropolitan Technological Institute, I have a specialization in formulation and evaluation of projects from this same institution and different seminars and diplomas in pedagogy. I am passionate about software development and teaching from a very young age, having the opportunity to apply my knowledge in institutions such as: Seguros Sura, the national learning service-SENA, the Medellín metro and the Medellín secretariat of education.
